name: BiS ARTIFACTS
description: BiS ARTIFACTS is an Ordinals Collection by Best in Slot that blends fully on-chain generative art with utility. Each and every artifact is unique, born from pure mathematics and shaped by Bitcoin blocks, inscription IDs, and sat numbers. As the first-ever lockable Ordinals collection via Ordinal Lockers, BiS ARTIFACTS introduces a new layer of utility, directly on Bitcoinâ€”unlocking BiS PRO membership, waiving fees, providing access to exclusive drops, and beyond.
